snippet.title: Universe For Sale - Official Story Trailer | The MIX Next August 2023
snippet.description: Meet the characters, learn more about the story, and get a peek at the sci-fi world of Universe For Sale in this latest trailer for the upcoming visual novel. Universe For Sale is a sci-fi narrative experience about human relationships and self-acceptance. Follow the stories of the nameless Master, a mysterious cultist, and Lila the universes vendor. Walk through Jupiter’s bazaars, meet absurd characters with incredible stories to tell, and craft your own stories with Lila’s power to create custom universes. Universe For Sale will be available on PC in 2023.
